entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. Low plus 1 with temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or a few thunderstorms changing to rain showers at times heavy with thunderstorms late this evening. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 then light this evening. Low plus 1 with temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
